phrase.original: Autosave could not be fully reconstructed. Partial reconstruction attempted instead.
phrase.translation: Autosave nije moguće potpuno obnoviti. Umjesto toga pokušao je djelomični rekonstrukcija.

phrase.original: How would you like to load this image?
Open it as a standalone image.
Add it to the current image as a new layer.
I can't decide. Cancel this action.
phrase.translation: Ne mogu odlučiti. Otkaži ovu radnju.

phrase.original: in the future, do this without asking me
ExifTool could not be started. Metadata unavailable for this session.
phrase.translation: Nije moguće pokrenuti ExifTool. Metapodaci nisu dostupni za ovu sesiju.

phrase.original: Please wait while the tag database is created
phrase.translation: Pričekajte dok je stvorena baza podataka oznake

phrase.original: The tag database handles technical details of the 20,000+ metadata tags supported by PhotoDemon. Creating the database takes 10 to 15 seconds, and it only needs to be created once, when the metadata editor is used for the first time.
phrase.translation: Baza oznaka obrađuje tehničke detalje 20.000 oznaka metapodataka koje podržava PhotoDemon. Stvaranje baze podataka traje 10 do 15 sekundi i potrebno ga je izraditi samo jednom, kada se prvi put koristi urednik metapodataka.

phrase.original: This image does not contain any metadata.
phrase.translation: Ova slika ne sadrži nikakve metapodatke.

phrase.original:
Before lossless copies can be saved, you must save this image at least once.
Lossless copies will be saved to the same folder as this initial image save.
phrase.translation: Prije spremanja bez gubitaka potrebno je barem jednom spremiti ovu sliku. BCRL Kopije bez gubitka bit će spremljene u istu mapu kao ova početna snimka.

phrase.original:
An unspecified error occurred when attempting to save this image. Please try saving the image to an alternate format.
If the problem persists, please report it to the PhotoDemon developers via photodemon.org/contact
phrase.translation:
Došlo je do neodređene pogreške prilikom pokušaja spremanja ove slike. Pokušajte spremiti sliku u alternativni format.
aš problem i dalje postoji, prijavite je programerima PhotoDemona putem photodemon.org

phrase.original: Unfortunately, this PC does not have enough memory to create a %1x%2 image. Please reduce the requested size and try again.
phrase.translation: Nažalost, ovo računalo nema dovoljno memorije za stvaranje slike %1x %2. Smanjite traženu veličinu i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Counting the number of unique colors in this image
phrase.translation: Brojanje broja jedinstvenih boja na ovoj slici

phrase.original:
This image contains %1 unique colors (RGB).
This image contains %2 unique color + opacity values (RGBA).
Image is all one color. Autocrop unnecessary.
phrase.translation: Slika je jedna boja. Autocrog nije potreban.

phrase.original: Image is already cropped intelligently. Autocrop abandoned. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: Slika je već inteligentno izrezana. Napušteno automatsko napajanje. (Slika nije izmijenjena.)

phrase.original: No active selection found. Crop abandoned.
phrase.translation: Nije pronađen aktivni odabir. Obrezani su.

phrase.original: Image is fully transparent. Trim abandoned.
Image is already trimmed. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: Slika je već ukrašena. (Slika nije izmijenjena.)

phrase.original: Multipage image found. Loading page #%1 of %2
phrase.translation: Pronađena je višestruka slika. Učitavanje stranice # %1 od %2

phrase.original: %1 save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: Spremanje %1 nije uspjelo (FreeImage_SaveEx tihi kvar). Prijavite ovu pogrešku pomoću Pomoć -> Pošalji izvješće o pogrešci.

phrase.original: %1 save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 spremanje nije uspjelo (FreeImage vratio prazno ručno). Prijavite ovu pogrešku pomoću Pomoć -> Pošalji izvješće o pogrešci.

phrase.original:
The FreeImage interface plug-in (FreeImage.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable support for this image format, please copy the FreeImage.dll file (downloadable from http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
Freeimage.Dll priključak (FreeImage.dll) je označen kao nedostaje ili onemogućen nakon inicijalizacije programa.
To omogućava podršku za ovaj format slike, molimo kopirajte FreeImage.dll datoteku (preuzmite s http:

phrase.original: Save cannot be completed without FreeImage library.
phrase.translation: Spremi se ne može dovršiti bez FreeImage knjižnice.

phrase.original: An error has occurred (#%1 - %2). PDI load abandoned.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do pogreške (# %1 - %2). Napušteno PDI opterećenje.

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel %1?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite poništiti %1?

phrase.original: This action will convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers, meaning you can no longer modify layer-specific settings like text, font, color or shape.
phrase.translation: Ta će radnja pretvoriti tekstne i vektorske slojeve u slojne (rastere) slojeve, što znači da više nećete moći mijenjati postavke specifične za pojedini sloj, poput teksta, fonta, boje ili oblika.

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite nastaviti?

phrase.original: Yes. Convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers.
phrase.translation: Da. Pretvaranje teksta i vektorskih slojeva u slike (raster) slojeva.

phrase.original: No. Leave text and vector layers as they are.
phrase.translation: Ne. Ostavite tekst i vektorske slojeve kakvi jesu.

phrase.original: This text layer will be changed to an image (raster) layer, meaning you can no longer modify its text or font settings.
phrase.translation: Ovaj tekstni sloj bit će promijenjen u sloj (slojni) sloj, što znači da više ne možete mijenjati svoj tekst ili postavke fonta.

phrase.original: Yes. Please convert this text layer.
No. Leave this text layer as it is.
phrase.translation: Ne. Ostavi ovaj tekstni sloj kakav jest.

phrase.original: In the future, automatically rasterize without prompting me
phrase.translation: U budućnosti će se automatski rasterizirati bez mene

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the image '%1' could not be found.
If this image was originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, slika " %1" nije pronađena.
a ta slika je izvorno locirana na prijenosnim medijima (DVD, USB pogon itd.), Ponovo umetnite ili ponovo priložite medij i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the file '%1' is currently locked by another program on this PC.
Please close this file in any other running programs, then try again.
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, datoteka ' %1' trenutno je zaključana s nekim drugim programom na ovom računalu.
Zatvorite ovu datoteku u bilo kojem drugom programu pokrenutom, a zatim pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it. Thanks!
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, PhotoDemon nije mogao učitati sljedeću sliku:
%1
Preuzmite drugi program za spremanje ove slike u generički format (kao što je JPEG ili PNG) prije nego što ga učitate. Hvala!

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image(s):
%1 Please verify that these image(s) exist, and that they use a supported image format (like JPEG or PNG). Thanks!
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, PhotoDemon nije mogao učitati sljedeće slike:
%1 Provjerite jesu li ove slike (e) postoje i da koriste podržani format slike (poput JPEG ili PNG). Hvala!

phrase.original:
This macro does not contain any recordable actions. Are you sure you want to stop recording?
(Press No to continue recording.)
phrase.translation:
Ova makronaredba ne sadrži nikakve radnje za snimanje. Jeste li sigurni da želite prekinuti snimanje?
(Pritisnite No za nastavak snimanja.)

phrase.original:
If you do not save this macro, all actions recorded during this session will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to cancel?
(Press No to return to the Save Macro screen. Note that you can always delete this macro later if you decide you don't want it.)
phrase.translation:
Ako ne spremite ovu makronaredbu, sve radnje snimljene tijekom ove sesije trajno će se izgubiti. Jeste li sigurni da želite otkazati?
(Pritisnite No da biste se vratili na zaslon Save Macro (Spremi makro). Napominjemo da makronaredbu makronaredbi možete kasnije maknuti ako odlučite da ga ne želite.)

phrase.original: Warning: last chance to save macro
phrase.translation: Upozorenje: posljednja prilika za spremanje makronaredbe

phrase.original: Incompatible macro version found. Macro playback abandoned.
phrase.translation: Pronađena je nekompatibilna makro verzija. Napuštena makro reprodukcija.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this macro file is no longer supported by the current version of PhotoDemon.
In version 6.0, PhotoDemon macro files were redesigned to support new features, improve performance, and solve some long-standing reliability issues. Unfortunately, this means that macros recorded prior to version 6.0 are no longer compatible. You will need to re-record these macros from scratch.
(Note that any old macro files will still work in old versions of PhotoDemon, if you absolutely need to access them.)
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, ovu makronu datoteku više ne podržava trenutna inačica programa PhotoDemon.
In 6.0, PhotoDemon makronaredbe su redizajnirane kako bi podržale nove značajke, poboljšale performanse i riješile neka dugogodišnja pitanja o pouzdanosti. Nažalost, to znači da makronaredbe snimljene prije verzije 6.0 više nisu kompatibilne. Morat ćete ponovno snimati te makronaredbe.
(Imajte na umu da će sve stare makronaredbe još uvijek funkcionirati u starijim verzijama programa PhotoDemon, ako ih apsolutno morate pristupiti.)
Promijenite veličinu slike koja je svjesna sadržaja
Zakrenite sliku 90 u smjeru kazaljke na satu
Zakrenite sliku 90 suprotno od kazaljke na satu
Zakrenite sloj 90 u smjeru kazaljke na satu
Zakrenite sloj 90 u smjeru suprotnom od kazaljke na satu
Promjena veličine sloja koji prati sadržaj
Izvezi masku za odabir kao sliku

phrase.original:
The selected scanner or digital camera isn't responding.
Please make sure the device is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation:
Odabrani skener ili digitalna kamera ne reagira.
Provjerite je li uređaj uključen i spreman za upotrebu.

phrase.original:
The scanner/digital camera interface plug-in (EZTW32.dll) was marked as missing upon program initialization.
To enable scanner support, please copy the EZTW32.dll file (available for download from http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
Unknown error occurred. Please make sure your scanner is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do nepoznate pogreške Provjerite je li skener uključen i spreman za upotrebu.

phrase.original: Scan successful, but temporary file save failed. Is it possible that your hard drive is full (or almost full)?
phrase.translation: Skeniranje je uspjelo, ali privremeno spremanje datoteke nije uspjelo. Je li moguće da je vaš tvrdi disk pun (ili gotovo pun)?

phrase.original: Unable to acquire DIB lock. Please make sure no other programs are accessing the scanner. If the problem persists, reboot and try again.
phrase.translation: Nije moguće dobiti DIB zaključavanje. Provjerite nemate li druge programe pristupiti skeneru. Ako se problem nastavi, ponovno pokrenite i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Temporary file access error. This can be caused when running on a system with limited access rights. Please enable admin rights and try again.
phrase.translation: Privremena pogreška pri pristupu datotekama. To može biti uzrokovano kada se pokreće sustav s ograničenim pravima pristupa. Omogućite administratorska prava i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Scan canceled at the user's request.
phrase.translation: Skeniranje je otkazano na zahtjev korisnika.

phrase.original: The scanner returned an error code that wasn't specified in the EZTW32.dll documentation (Error #%1). Please visit http://www.eztwain.com for more information.
phrase.translation: Skener je vratio kôd pogreške koji nije naveden u dokumentaciji EZTW32.dll (Error # %1). Posjetite http:

phrase.original: Using OptiPNG to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: Koristeći OptiPNG za optimizaciju PNG datoteke. Ovo može potrajati

phrase.original: Using pngquant to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: Koristeći pngquant za optimizaciju PNG datoteke. Ovo može potrajati

phrase.original: PNGQuant could not write file. Default 32bpp image was saved instead.
phrase.translation: PNGQuant nije mogao pisati datoteku. Umjesto toga spremljena je zadana 32bpp slika.

phrase.original: Image successfully sent to Windows Photo Printer.
phrase.translation: Slika je uspješno poslana u Windows Photo Printer.

phrase.original:
Unknown processor request submitted: %1
Please report this bug via the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
Objavljen nepoznati zahtjev za procesor: %1
Prijavite ovu pogrešku putem izbornika Pomoć -> Pošalji izvješće o pogrešci.

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) by shutting down unneeded programs - especially your web browser, if it is open - then try the action again.
phrase.translation: Nema dovoljno memorije za nastavak ove operacije. Oslobodite memoriju sustava (RAM) zatvaranjem nepotrebnih programa - osobito vašeg web preglednika, ako je otvoren - pa pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: The specified file could not be located. If it was located on removable media, please re-insert the proper floppy disk, CD, or portable drive. If the file is not located on portable media, make sure that: 1) the file hasn't been deleted, and... 2) the file location provided to PhotoDemon is correct.
phrase.translation: Navedena datoteka nije moguće pronaći. Ako se nalazi na prijenosnom mediju, ponovo umetnite pravu floppy disk, CD ili prijenosni disk. Ako se datoteka ne nalazi na prijenosnim medijima, provjerite je li: 1) datoteka nije izbrisana i... 2) točna lokacija datoteke koja je pod uvjetom da je PhotoDemon ispravna.

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon cannot locate additional information for this error. That probably means this error is a bug, and it needs to be fixed!
Would you like to submit a bug report? (It takes less than one minute, and it helps everyone who uses the software.)
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon ne može pronaći dodatne informacije za ovu pogrešku. To vjerojatno znači da je ta pogreška bug i treba biti fiksna!
Želite li poslati izvješće o pogrešci? (Potrebno je manje od jedne minute i pomaže svima koji koriste softver.)

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has experienced an error. Details on the problem include:
Error number %1 Description: %2
%3
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon je doživio pogrešku. Pojedinosti o tom problemu uključuju:
Error broj %1 Description: %2
%3

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened the bug report webpage for you. Please click the "New Issue" button, then select "Bug Report". Answer the questions as best you can, and please include the following error number somewhere in your report: %1
When finished, click the Submit New Issue button. Thank you!

An error occurred when attempting to save this image. The FreeImage plugin reported the following error details:
%1
In the meantime, please try saving the image to an alternate format. You can also let the PhotoDemon developers know about this via the Help > Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
Došlo je do pogreške prilikom pokušaja spremanja ove slike. FreeImage dodatak izvijestio je sljedeće pojedinosti o pogrešci:
%1
I međuvremenu, pokušajte spremiti sliku u alternativni format. Također možete omogućiti programerima PhotoDemona o tome putem izbornika Pomoć> Pošalji izvješće o pogrešci.

phrase.original: Output format not recognized. Save aborted. Please use the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu item to report this incident.
phrase.translation: Format ispisa nije prepoznat. Spremi prekid. Upotrijebite stavku izbornika Pomoć -> Pošalji izvješće o pogrešci kako biste prijavili ovaj incident.

phrase.original: This is a still image (only one frame of animation).
You may proceed, but the image will be saved as a static image, not an animated one.
Could not retrieve program window - the program appears to have been unloaded.
phrase.translation: Nije moguće dohvatiti programski prozor - čini se da je program bio prazan.

phrase.original: An error occurred while attempting to load %1. Please verify that the file is a valid PhotoDemon selection file.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom pokušaja učitavanja %1. Provjerite je li datoteka važeća datoteka za odabir PhotoDemona.

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Selection was not saved. Please try again.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do nepoznate pogreške Odabir nije spremljen. Molim te pokušaj ponovno.

phrase.original: This action requires an active selection. Please create a selection before continuing.
phrase.translation: Ta radnja zahtijeva aktivan odabir. Izradite odabir prije nastavka.

phrase.original: Release the mouse button to complete the lasso selection
phrase.translation: Otpustite gumb miša da biste dovršili odabir lasera

phrase.original: Click on the first point to complete the polygon selection
phrase.translation: Pritisnite prvu točku da biste dovršili izbor poligona

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a value between %2 and %3.
phrase.translation: %1 nije važeći unos. prijavite vrijednost između %2 i %3.

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a numeric value.
phrase.translation: %1 nije važeći unos. Upišite numeričku vrijednost.

phrase.original: Ctrl+click to move the active layer here
Shift key: preserve layer aspect ratio
phrase.translation: Tipka Shift: sačuvajte omjer slike sloja

phrase.original: Update check postponed (a check has been performed recently)
phrase.translation: Provjera ažuriranja odgođena (provjera je nedavno provedena)

phrase.original: Initializing software updater (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
phrase.translation: Inicijalizacija softvera za ažuriranje (ova značajka može se onemogućiti iz izbornika Alati -> Mogućnosti)

phrase.original: This image does not contain any GPS metadata.
phrase.translation: Ova slika ne sadrži nikakve GPS metapodatke.

phrase.original: The clipboard is empty or it does not contain a valid picture format. Please copy a valid image onto the clipboard and try again.
phrase.translation: Međuspremnik je prazan ili ne sadrži valjani format slike. Kopirajte valjanu sliku na međuspremnik i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Image URL found. Attempting to download
phrase.translation: Pronađen je URL slike. Pokušaj preuzimanja

phrase.original: Image download failed. Please copy a valid image URL and try again.
phrase.translation: Preuzimanje slike nije uspjelo. Kopirajte valjani URL slike i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: ExifTool plugin missing. Metadata import abandoned.
phrase.translation: Nedostaje ExifTool dodatak. Napušteno je uvoz metapodataka.

phrase.original: Removing metadata with potential privacy concerns
phrase.translation: Uklanjanje metapodataka s mogućim poteškoćama vezanim uz privatnost

phrase.original: Unfortunately, the number of images you selected exceeds what Windows® allows for a single load operation. Please try again with a smaller set of selected images.
phrase.translation: Nažalost, broj odabranih slika premašuje ono što Windows' omogućuje rad s jednim opterećenjem. Pokušajte ponovno s manjim skupom odabranih slika.

phrase.original: Mouse Wheel = VERTICAL SCROLL, Shift + Wheel = HORIZONTAL SCROLL, Ctrl + Wheel = ZOOM
phrase.translation: Mouse Wheel = VERTICAL SCROLL, Pomakni kotačić = HORIZONTAL SCROLL, Ctrl Wheel = ZOOM

phrase.original: Action canceled: target layer isn't visible.
Center the image inside the viewport

Drag an image onto this space to begin editing.
You can also use the Open Image button on the left, or the File > Open and File > Import menus.
phrase.translation:
Povucite sliku na taj prostor za početak uređivanja.
Možete koristiti i gumb Otvori sliku na lijevoj strani, VBCRLZa datoteku> Otvori i Datoteka> Uvoz izbornika.

phrase.original: Click to enter a full color selection screen.
phrase.translation: Kliknite za unos cijelog zaslona za odabir boje.

phrase.original: Click to make the main screen's paint color the active color.
phrase.translation: Kliknite da biste boju boja glavnog zaslona u boji prikazale aktivnu boju.
Zakreni ritam u smjeru kazaljke na satu
Zakrenite boju u smjeru suprotnom od kazaljke na satu

phrase.original: Reset all settings to their default values.
phrase.translation: Ponovno postavite sve postavke na njihove zadane vrijednosti.

phrase.original: Randomly select new settings for this tool. This is helpful for exploring how different settings affect the image.
phrase.translation: Nasumično odaberite nove postavke za ovaj alat. Ovo je korisno za istraživanje kako različite postavke utječu na sliku.

phrase.original: Save the current settings as a new preset.
phrase.translation: Spremite trenutne postavke kao novu postavku.

phrase.original: Previously saved presets can be selected here. You can save the current settings as a new preset by clicking the Save Preset button on the right.
phrase.translation: Ovdje možete odabrati prethodno spremljene presete. Trenutačne postavke možete spremiti u novu postavku tako da kliknete gumb Spremi unaprijed postavku desno.

phrase.original: Once this image has been saved to disk, its filename will appear here.
phrase.translation: Nakon što je ta slika spremljena na disk, njegov će se naziv datoteke pojaviti ovdje.

phrase.original: This image does not have a filename.
Hover an image thumbnail to see its name and current file location.
phrase.translation: Zadržite pokazivač miša da biste vidjeli njegovo ime i trenutnu lokaciju datoteke.

phrase.original: copy all relevant metadata to the new file
phrase.translation: Kopirajte sve relevantne metapodatke u novu datoteku

phrase.original: erase tags that might be personal (including GPS and location)
phrase.translation: Izbrisati oznake koje mogu biti osobne (uključujući GPS i lokaciju)

phrase.original: This image does not contain metadata.
Generate a new random number seed.
The final width and height measurements must be between 1 and 32760 pixels.
phrase.translation: Konačna mjerenja širine i visine moraju biti između 1 i 32760 piksela.

phrase.original: Preserve aspect ratio (sometimes called Constrain Proportions). Use this option to resize an image while keeping the width and height in sync.
phrase.translation: Sačuvaj omjer slike (ponekad se zove Proporcije). Koristite ovu opciju da biste promijenili veličinu slike dok držite širinu i visinu u sinkronizaciji.

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used to resize the image.
phrase.translation: Promijenite jedinicu mjerenja koja se koristi za promjenu veličine slike.

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used for image resolution (pixel density).
phrase.translation: Promijenite jedinicu mjerenja koja se koristi za razlučivost slike (gustoća piksela).

phrase.original: exact aspect ratio will vary by image
phrase.translation: Točan omjer slike varira po slici

phrase.original: exact size will vary by image
phrase.translation: Točna veličina varira ovisno o slici

phrase.original: "%1" produces an out of range result (%2). The final value must be between %3 and %4.

phrase.translation: (Poruke će se pojaviti ovdje u vrijeme izvođenja)

phrase.original: Change the image size unit displayed to the left of this box
phrase.translation: Promijenite jedinicu veličine slike koja se prikazuje lijevo od ovog okvira

phrase.original: Select which scanner or camera to use
phrase.translation: Odaberite skener ili kameru za uporabu
Zakreni 90 u smjeru kazaljke na satu
Zakreni 90 u smjeru suprotnom od kazaljke na satu

phrase.original: Other open images into this image (as layers)

phrase.translation: Naslovi kategorija alata za prikaz alata

phrase.original: Show when multiple images are loaded
phrase.translation: Prikaži kada su učitane više slika

phrase.original: Support us with a one-time donation
Read license and terms of use
A new version of PhotoDemon is available. The update is automatically processing in the background
phrase.translation: Dostupna je nova verzija programa PhotoDemon. Ažuriranje se automatski obrađuje u pozadini

phrase.original: This copy of PhotoDemon is up to date.

A new version of PhotoDemon is available!
The update is automatically processing in the background. You will receive a new notification when it completes.
phrase.translation: Dostupna je nova verzija programa PhotoDemon! VBCRLPod ažuriranje se automatski obrađuje u pozadini. Kada završite, primit ćete novu obavijest.

phrase.original:
This copy of PhotoDemon is the newest version available.
(Current version: %1.%2.%3)
phrase.translation:
Ova kopija programa PhotoDemon je najnovija verzija dostupna.
(trenutačna verzija: %1. %2. %3)

phrase.original: Please wait while the new language is applied
phrase.translation: Pričekajte dok se novi jezik primijeni

phrase.original: sample image for true contrast (slower but more accurate)
phrase.translation: Slika uzorka za istinski kontrast (sporiji, ali točniji)

phrase.original: Converting image to black and white
Adjusting hue, saturation, and luminance values
phrase.translation: Podešavanje vrijednosti nijansi, zasićenja i osvjetljenja

phrase.original: color to replace (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: Boja za zamjenu (kliknite desnom tipkom miša za odabir)

phrase.original: left-click to add new nodes or drag existing nodes
phrase.translation: Kliknite lijevu tipku da biste dodali nove čvorove ili povucite postojeće čvorove
Kliknite desnom tipkom miša da biste uklonili čvorove

phrase.original: (Note: move the mouse over the histogram to calculate these values)
phrase.translation: (Napomena: pomaknite miš preko histograma da biste izračunali te vrijednosti)

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the shadow input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: Kada je taj gumb aktivan, možete postaviti boju razine ulaznih sesija tako da desnom tipkom miša kliknete boju u prozoru za pregled.

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the highlight input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: Kada je ova tipka aktivna, možete postaviti boju boja za unos podataka tako da desnom tipkom miša kliknete boju u prozoru za pregled.
Pretvaranje crno-bijele slike u nijansu sive

phrase.original: Like all monochrome-to-grayscale tools, this tool will produce a blurry image. You can use the Effects -> Sharpen -> Unsharp Masking tool to fix this. (For best results, use an Unsharp Mask radius at least as large as this radius.)
phrase.translation: Kao i svi alati crno-bijele do sivih tonova, ovaj alat će proizvesti zamućenu sliku. Za rješavanje ovog alata možete upotrijebiti alat Efektima -> Obrije -> Unsharp Masking. (Za najbolje rezultate upotrijebite polumjer Unsharp Mask koji je barem velik kao ovaj radijus.)

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, make sky darker in black/white photos
phrase.translation: Apsorbiraju prekomjernu nebo plavu, čine nebo tamnije u crnoj boji

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, emphasizing clouds
phrase.translation: Apsorbiraju prekomjernu nebo plavu, naglašavajući oblake

phrase.original: high blue absorption; correction for sky, cloud, and foliage
phrase.translation: Visoka plava apsorpcija; Korekcija neba, oblaka i lišća

phrase.original: moderate contrast in black/white outdoor photography
minus blue; reduce haze in aerial photos
phrase.translation: Minus plava; Smanjiti izmaglicu u zračnim fotografijama

phrase.original: darken sky in black/white outdoor photography
contrast filter for blue and blue-green absorption
phrase.translation: Kontrastni filter za plavu i plavo-zelenu apsorpciju

phrase.original: contrast effects, darken sky and water
phrase.translation: Kontrastne efekte, potamni nebo i vodu

phrase.original: red for two-color photography (daylight or tungsten)
phrase.translation: Crvena za fotografiju u boji (dnevna svjetlost ili volfram)

phrase.original: tricolor red; contrast effects in outdoor scenes
phrase.translation: Trobojno crveno; Kontrastne efekte na sceni na otvorenom

phrase.original: stereo red; cuts haze, useful for storm or moonlight settings
phrase.translation: Stereo crvena; Smanjuje izmaglice, korisno za postavke oluje ili mjesečine

phrase.original: color separation; extreme sky darkening in black/white photos
phrase.translation: Odvajanje boje; Ekstremno nebo tamnjelo u crnoj boji

phrase.original: red absorption; useful for contrast in microscopy
phrase.translation: Crvena apsorpcija; Korisno za kontrast u mikroskopiji

phrase.original: direct color separation; contrast effects in commercial photography
phrase.translation: Izravno razdvajanje boja; Kontrast učinke u komercijalnoj fotografiji

phrase.original: enhance blue and purple objects; useful for fluorescent dyes
phrase.translation: Poboljšati plave i ljubičaste predmete; Korisno za fluorescentne boje

phrase.original: color separation; calibration using SMPTE color bars
phrase.translation: Odvajanje boje; Kalibracija pomoću SMPTE boja

phrase.original: used for color separation; improves definition of foliage
phrase.translation: Koji se koristi za razdvajanje boja; Poboljšava definiciju lišća

phrase.original: used for color separation, tungsten tricolor projection
phrase.translation: Koristi se za odvajanje boje, vrućinsku trobojnu projekciju
Blokiranje filtra dugog filma s infracrvenim fotografijama

phrase.original: cooling filter, 3200K to 5500K; converts indoor lighting to sunlight
phrase.translation: Filter za hlađenje, 3200K do 5500K; Pretvara unutarnju rasvjetu na sunčevu svjetlost

phrase.original: warming filter (lowers color temperature), 3400 K to 3200 K

phrase.translation: Filtar za zagrijavanje; Nešto jači od 81A
Filtar za zagrijavanje; Nešto jači od 81B
Filtar za zagrijavanje; Nešto jači od 81 ° C
Filtar za zagrijavanje; Nešto jači od 81D

phrase.original: warming filter, 5500K to 3400K; converts sunlight to incandescent
phrase.translation: Filtar za zagrijavanje od 5500K do 3400K; Pretvara sunčevo svjetlo u žarulju
Filtar za zagrijavanje od 5500K do 3200K; Nasuprot 80A
Filtar za zagrijavanje od 5500K do 3800K; Suprotno od 80 ° C

phrase.original: remove color before photographing; rarely used for actual photos
phrase.translation: Ukloniti boju prije fotografiranja; Rijetko se koristi za stvarne fotografije

phrase.original: neutral density filter; equally blocks all light frequencies
phrase.translation: Filtar neutralne gustoće; Jednako blokira sve svjetlosne frekvencije

phrase.original: Searching image for potential red-eye locations
phrase.translation: Traženje slike za moguće lokacije crvenih očiju
Primjena konačnih korekcija crvenih očiju ( %1 od %2)
Podešavanje sjena, srednjih tonova i naglašava

phrase.original: Autosave data found. Would you like to restore it?
phrase.translation: Pronađeno je automatsko spremanje podataka. Želite li ga vratiti?

phrase.original: A previous PhotoDemon session terminated unexpectedly. Would you like to automatically recover the following autosaved images?
phrase.translation: Prethodna PhotoDemon sesija je neočekivano završila. Želite li automatski vratiti sljedeće automatske slike?

phrase.original: If you exit now, this autosave data will be lost forever. Are you sure you want to exit?
phrase.translation: Ako izađete sada, podaci o automatskom pohranu bit će izgubljeni zauvijek. Jesi li siguran da želiš izaći?

phrase.original: Warning: autosave data will be deleted
phrase.translation: Upozorenje: podaci o automatskom spremanju bit će izbrisani

phrase.original: enter a name for this preset
A preset with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
phrase.translation: Već postoji unaprijed postavljena postavka s tim nazivom. Želite li ga prebrisati?

phrase.original: Please enter a name for this preset.
A gradient with the name "%1" already exists in your collection. Would you like to overwrite it?
This gradient doesn't have a name. Please give it a name before adding it to your collection.
Unfortunately, the gradient file "%1" doesn't appear to be a valid gradient file.
Left-click to add new nodes or edit existing nodes. Right-click a node to remove it.
phrase.translation: Lijevi klik za dodavanje novih čvorova ili uređivanje postojećih čvorova. Desnom tipkom miša kliknite čvor da biste je uklonili.

phrase.original: Your gradient collection is stored in the "%1" folder
click to open the gradient collection folder in Windows Explorer
When a gradient contains colors with wildly different luminance values, gamma correction may improve its appearance.
Use this setting to automatically calculate equal positioning for all gradient nodes.
I understand the risks of running PhotoDemon in the IDE
phrase.translation: Razumijem rizike pokretanja programa PhotoDemon u IDE-u

phrase.original: Do not display this warning again
in the future, automatically apply these settings
phrase.translation: U budućnosti, automatski primjenjuju te postavke

phrase.original: This image contains more than 16 million colors. Before it can be displayed on your screen, it must be converted to a simpler format. This process is called tone mapping.
phrase.translation: Ova slika sadrži više od 16 milijuna boja. Prije nego što se može prikazati na zaslonu, mora se pretvoriti u jednostavniji format. Taj se proces zove tonsko mapiranje.
Čeka se upute za mapiranje tonova

phrase.original: Save the image before closing it
Repeat this action for all unsaved images (X in total)
phrase.translation: Ponovite tu radnju za sve nespremljene slike (ukupno X)

phrase.original: Do not save the image (discard all changes)

phrase.translation: Otkažite i vratite se na uređivanje

phrase.original:
NOTE: if you click 'Save', PhotoDemon will save this image using its current file name.
If you want to save it with a different file name, please select 'Cancel', then use the File -> Save As menu item.
phrase.translation:
NAPOMENA: ako kliknete "Spremi", PhotoDemon će spremiti ovu sliku pomoću trenutnog naziva datoteke.
If želite ga spremiti različitim nazivom datoteke, odaberite 'Cancel', a zatim upotrijebite stavku izbornika File -> Save As.

phrase.original: Because this image has not been saved before, you will be prompted to provide a file name for it.
phrase.translation: Budući da ova slika nije prethodno spremljena, od vas će se zatražiti da mu navedete naziv datoteke.

phrase.original: If you do not save this image, any changes you have made will be permanently lost.
phrase.translation: Ako ne spremite ovu sliku, sve izmjene koje ste napravili trajno će se izgubiti.

phrase.original: Canceling will return you to the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: Otkazivanje će vas vratiti u glavni prozor PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: %1 has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
phrase.translation: %1 ima nespremljene izmjene. Što bi ti volio raditi?

phrase.original: Repeat this action for both unsaved images
phrase.translation: Ponovite tu radnju za obje nespremljene slike

phrase.original: Repeat this action for all unsaved images (%1 in total)
phrase.translation: Ponovite tu radnju za sve nespremljene slike (ukupno %1)

phrase.original: in the future, do not notify me of updates
phrase.translation: U budućnosti, nemojte me obavijestiti o ažuriranjima

phrase.original: Learn more about the new features in %1
phrase.translation: Saznajte više o novim značajkama u %1

phrase.original: (Sorry, but automatic restarts don't work inside the IDE.)
phrase.translation: (Nažalost, automatska ponovna pokretanja ne rade unutar IDE-a.)

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. Restart the program to complete the update process.
phrase.translation: Dostupna je nova verzija programa PhotoDemon. Ponovo pokrenite program da biste dovršili proces ažuriranja.

phrase.original: Restart now to access to the latest version of the program.
phrase.translation: Ponovno pokreni sada da biste pristupili najnovijoj verziji programa.

phrase.original: If you're in the middle of something, feel free to keep working. The update process will automatically complete whenever you next use the program.
phrase.translation: Ako ste usred nečega, slobodno nastavite raditi. Postupak ažuriranja automatski će se završiti svaki put kada sljedeći put upotrijebite program.

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the image
phrase.translation: Ako se pikseli nalaze izvan slike

phrase.original: Note: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window.
phrase.translation: Napomena: možete i postaviti središnji položaj klikom na prozor pregleda.

phrase.original: Peering at image through imaginary kaleidoscope
phrase.translation: Pogled na sliku preko zamišljenog kaleidoskopa

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the corrected area
phrase.translation: Ako se pikseli nalaze izvan ispravljenog područja

phrase.original: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window
phrase.translation: Također možete postaviti središnju poziciju klikom na prozor pregleda

phrase.original: Dipping image in virtual wave pool
phrase.translation: Zamanje slike u bazenu virtualnog vala

phrase.original: Tracing image edges with virtual paintbrush
Searching each pixel range for edges
phrase.translation: Pretraživanje svakog raspona piksela za rubove
Osvjetljavajuća slika s zamišljenim crnim svjetlom

phrase.original: Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow
phrase.translation: Neka snijeg, neka snijeg, neka snijeg

phrase.original: Printing image to digital halftone surface
phrase.translation: Ispis slike na digitalnu površinu polutonova

phrase.original: Applying petroleum jelly to camera lens
Applying pan and zoom (Ken Burns) effect
phrase.translation: Primjena učinka pan i zoom (Ken Burns)

phrase.original: If you want to enlarge the canvas to fit the rotated image, please use the Image -> Rotate menu instead.
phrase.translation: Ako želite povećati platno kako bi odgovarao rotirajuoj slici, umjesto toga upotrijebite izbornik Image -> Rotate.

phrase.original: click OK to begin the repair operation
phrase.translation: Kliknite OK (U redu) da biste započeli postupak popravka

phrase.original: attempt to repair video and audio files
phrase.translation: Pokušajte popraviti video i audio datoteke

phrase.original: overwrite matching filenames in the destination folder
phrase.translation: Prebrisati podudaranje datoteka u odredišnoj mapi

phrase.original: after a successful recovery, erase the original (unrepaired) file
phrase.translation: Nakon uspješnog oporavka izbrisati originalnu datoteku (nepravilno)

phrase.original: generating list of files to repair

phrase.translation: Popravci su popravljeni. Popravljene su %1 datoteke.

phrase.original:
%1 files(s) repaired.
Repaired files have been saved to the destination folder. Unrepaired files remain in their original locations.
phrase.translation:
%1 datoteke popravljene.
Popravljene datoteke spremljene su u odredišnu mapu. Nepravilne datoteke ostaju na izvornim lokacijama.

phrase.original: The source folder does not contain any files. Please try another folder.
phrase.translation: Izvorna mapa ne sadrži nikakve datoteke. Pokušajte s nekom drugom mapom.

phrase.original: Step 1: select the photo editing action(s) to apply to each image
phrase.translation: Korak 1: odaberite akciju za uređivanje fotografija koja će se primijeniti na svaku sliku

phrase.original: remove all images in this folder
phrase.translation: Uklonite sve slike u ovoj mapi

phrase.original: (batch conversion process will appear here at run-time)
phrase.translation: (Proces pretvorbe serije pojavit će se ovdje u vrijeme pokretanja)

phrase.original: add a prefix to each filename
add a suffix to each filename
remove the following text (if found) from each filename
phrase.translation: Uklonite sljedeći tekst (ako je pronađen) iz svakog naziva datoteke

phrase.original: force each filename, including extension, to the following case
phrase.translation: Prisiliti svaki naziv datoteke, uključujući proširenje, na sljedeći slučaj

phrase.original: replace spaces in filenames with underscores
phrase.translation: Zamijenite mjesta u imenima s podvlascima
Upotrijebite podudaranje osjetljivom na veličinu slova

phrase.original: after images are processed, save them with the following name
phrase.translation: Nakon što se slike obrađuju, spremite ih sljedećim nazivom

phrase.original: set export settings for this format
phrase.translation: Postavite postavke izvoza za ovaj format

phrase.original: keep images in their original format
convert all images to a new format
phrase.translation: Pretvoriti sve slike u novi format

phrase.original: if you only want to rename images or change image formats, use this option
phrase.translation: Ako samo želite preimenovati slike ili promijeniti formate slike, koristite ovu opciju

phrase.original: apply other actions from a saved macro file
phrase.translation: Primijenite druge radnje iz spremljene makronaredbe
Popraviti izloženost i probleme s rasvjetom

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel the current batch process?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite poništiti trenutni postupak serije?

phrase.original:
If you exit now, your batch list (the list of images to be processed) will be lost. By saving your list, you can easily resume this batch operation at a later date.
Would you like to save your batch list before exiting?
phrase.translation:
Ako izađete sada, bit će izgubljen popis serija (popis slika koji će se obrađivati). Spremanjem popisa možete kasnije ponovno nastaviti s radom serija.
Želite li spremiti svoj popis serija prije izlaska?

phrase.original: You have already created a list of images for processing. The list of images inside this file will be appended to the bottom of your current list.
phrase.translation: Već ste stvorili popis slika za obradu. Popis slika unutar ove datoteke bit će dodan do dna vašeg trenutnog popisa.

phrase.original: This is not a valid list of images. Please try a different file.
phrase.translation: Ovo nije važeći popis slika. Pokušajte s drugom datotekom.

phrase.original: You have requested that a macro be applied to each image, but no macro file has been selected. Please select a valid macro file.
phrase.translation: Zatražili ste da se na svaku sliku primijeni makronaredba, ali nijedna makronaredba nije odabrana. Odaberite valjanu makronaredbu.

phrase.original: You have not selected any images to process! Please add one or more images to the batch list.
phrase.translation: Niste odabrali niti jednu sliku za obradu! Dodajte jednu ili više slika na popis serija.

phrase.original: Before proceeding, you need to click the "set export settings for this format" button to specify what export settings you want to use.
phrase.translation: Prije nastavka kliknite gumb "Postavke izvoza za ovaj format" da biste odredili koje postavke izvoza želite upotrijebiti.

phrase.original: PhotoDemon cannot access the requested output folder. Please select a non-system, unrestricted folder for the batch process.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon ne može pristupiti traženoj izlaznoj mapi. Odaberite ne-sustavnu, neograničenu mapu za skupni proces.

phrase.original: Welcome to PhotoDemon's batch wizard. This tool can be used to edit multiple images at once, in what is called a "batch process".
phrase.translation: Dobro došli u PhotoDemonov čarobnjak. Ovaj alat može se koristiti za uređivanje više slika odjednom, u onom što se zove "skupni proces".

phrase.original: Start by selecting the photo editing action(s) you want to apply. If multiple actions are selected, they will be applied in the order they appear on this page.
phrase.translation: Započnite odabirom akcije za uređivanje fotografija koje želite primijeniti. Ako su odabrane više radnji, one će se primijeniti redom kojim se pojavljuju na ovoj stranici.

phrase.original: Note: a "macro" is simply a list of photo editing actions. It can include any adjustment, filter, or effect in the main program. You can create a new macro by using the "Tools -> Macros -> Record new macro" menu in the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: Napomena: "makronaredba" jednostavno je popis radnji za uređivanje fotografija. Može uključiti bilo koju prilagodbu, filtar ili efekt u glavnom programu. Možete stvoriti novu makronaredbu pomoću izbornika "Alati -> Makronaredbe -> Snimaj novu makronaredbu" u glavnom prozoru programa PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: In the next step, you will select the images you want to process.
phrase.translation: U sljedećem koraku birate slike koje želite obraditi.

phrase.original: Step 2: prepare the batch list (the list of images to be processed)
phrase.translation: Korak 2: pripremite popis serija (popis slika koje treba obrađivati)

phrase.original: You can add files to the batch list in two ways
phrase.translation: Datoteke možete dodati na popis serija na dva načina

phrase.original: 1) By manually adding one or more image file(s) using a standard Open Image dialog.
phrase.translation: 1) ručno dodavanje jedne ili više slikovnih datoteka pomoću standardnog dijaloškog okvira Otvori sliku.

phrase.original: 2) By adding entire folders at once. Image file(s) inside the folder (or subfolders, if selected) will be automatically identified.
phrase.translation: 2) dodavanjem cijele mape odjednom. Datoteke datoteka unutar mape (ili podmape, ako su odabrane) automatski će se identificirati.

phrase.original: In the next step, you will choose how you want the processed images saved.
phrase.translation: U sljedećem koraku birate kako želite spremljene obrađene slike.

phrase.original: Step 3: choose a destination image format
PhotoDemon needs to know which format to use when saving the images in your batch list.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon treba znati koji format treba koristiti prilikom spremanja slika na vašem popisu serija.

phrase.original: If "keep images in their original format" is selected, PhotoDemon will attempt to save each image in its original format. If the original format is not supported, a standard format (JPEG or PNG, depending on color depth) will be used.
phrase.translation: Ako odaberete "držite slike u izvornom formatu", PhotoDemon će pokušati spremiti svaku sliku u izvornom formatu. Ako izvorni format nije podržan, upotrijebit će se standardni format (JPEG ili PNG, ovisno o dubini boje).

phrase.original: If you choose to save images to a new format, please make sure the format you have selected is appropriate for all images in your list. (For example, images with transparency should be saved to a format that supports transparency!)
phrase.translation: Ako odaberete spremanje slika u novi format, provjerite je li format koji ste odabrali prikladan za sve slike na popisu. (Na primjer, slike s transparentnošću trebaju biti spremljene u format koji podržava transparentnost!)

phrase.original: In the final step, you will choose how you want the saved files to be named.
phrase.translation: U zadnjem će koraku odabrati način na koji želite spremiti spremljene datoteke.

phrase.original: Step 4: provide a destination folder and any renaming options
phrase.translation: Korak 4: unesite odredišnu mapu i sve opcije preimenovanja

phrase.original: In this final step, PhotoDemon needs to know where to save the processed images, and what name to give the new files.
phrase.translation: U ovom zadnjem koraku, PhotoDemon treba znati gdje spremiti obrađene slike i koje ime dati nove datoteke.

phrase.original: For your convenience, a number of standard renaming options are also provided. Note that all items under "additional rename options" are optional.
phrase.translation: Radi vaše udobnosti, nude se i brojne standardne opcije preimenovanja. Imajte na umu da su sve stavke pod "dodatnim opcijama preimenovanja" neobavezne.

phrase.original: Finally, if two or more images in the batch list have the same filename, and the "original filenames" option is selected, such files will automatically be given unique filenames upon saving (e.g. "original-filename (2)").
phrase.translation: Konačno, ako dvije ili više slika na popisu serija imaju isti naziv datoteke, a odabrana je opcija "izvorni nazivi datoteka", takve datoteke automatski će biti dodijeljene jedinstvene nazive datoteka prilikom spremanja (na primjer, "original-filename (2)").

phrase.original: Step 5: wait for batch processing to finish
phrase.translation: 5. korak: pričekajte da se obrada završi
Batch obrada je sada u tijeku.

phrase.original: Once the batch processor has processed several images, it will display an estimated time remaining.
phrase.translation: Nakon što se batch procesor obradi nekoliko slika, on će prikazati preostalo vrijeme.

phrase.original: You can cancel batch processing at any time by pressing the "Cancel" button in the bottom-right corner. If you choose to cancel, any processed images will still be present in the output folder, so you may need to remove them manually.
phrase.translation: U bilo kojem trenutku možete otkazati skupnu obradu pritiskom na gumb "Odustani" u donjem desnom kutu. Ako odlučite otkazati, sve obrađene slike i dalje će biti prisutne u izlaznoj mapi, pa ćete ih možda morati ukloniti ručno.

phrase.original: Save the current list of images
You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more files to the batch list before saving.
phrase.translation: Niste odabrali nikakve slikovne datoteke. Prije spremanja dodajte jednu ili više datoteka na popis serija.

phrase.original: if PhotoDemon does not support an image's original format, a standard format will be used
phrase.translation: Ako PhotoDemon ne podržava originalni format slike, upotrijebit će se standardni format

phrase.original: ( specifically, JPEG at 92% quality for photographs, and lossless PNG for non-photographs )
phrase.translation: (Specifično, JPEG pri 92 %kvalitete za fotografije i PNG bez gubitaka za ne-fotografije)

phrase.original: Batch conversion canceled. %1 image(s) were processed before cancelation. Last processed image was "%2".
Waiting for user to specify export options
phrase.translation: Čeka se korisniku da odrede mogućnosti izvoza

phrase.original: This button only affects the preview above. The repeat setting on the right is what will be used by the exported image file.
frame time for undefined layers (in ms)

Adobe Swatch Exchange (ASE) files can store multiple palettes inside a single file. If you select the "append" option, PhotoDemon will add this palette to your existing ASE file. Any palettes already inside the file will not be modified.
full download path (must begin with "http://" or "ftp://")
phrase.translation: Puni put za preuzimanje (mora početi s "http:

phrase.original: Attempting to connect to the Internet

%1 could not establish an Internet connection. Please double-check your connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.
phrase.translation: %1 nije mogao uspostaviti internetsku vezu. Provjerite svoju vezu dvostruko. Ako se problem nastavi, pokušajte preuzeti sliku ručno pomoću internetskog preglednika po izboru. Nakon preuzimanja datoteke možete otvoriti u %1 kao i svaka druga slikovna datoteka.

phrase.original: Verifying image URL (this may take a moment)
phrase.translation: Provjera URL slike (to može potrajati trenutak)

phrase.original: %1 could not locate a valid file at that URL. Please double-check the path. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1 nije mogao pronaći važeću datoteku na tom URL-u. Dvaput provjerite put. Ako se problem nastavi, pokušajte preuzeti datoteku ručno pomoću internetskog preglednika.
URL slike potvrđen je. Preuzimanje slike

phrase.original: %1 lost access to the Internet. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1 izgubio je pristup internetu. Molimo dvaput provjerite svoju internetsku vezu. Ako se problem nastavi, pokušajte preuzeti datoteku ručno pomoću internetskog preglednika.
Preuzimanje je dovršeno. Potvrđivanje integriteta datoteke
Preuzimanje je otkazano. (Daljinski poslužitelj je odbijen pristup.)

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, %1 is preventing %2 from directly downloading this image. (Direct downloads are sometimes mistaken as hotlinking by misconfigured servers.)
You will need to download this file using your Internet browser, then manually load it into %2.
I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience, but unfortunately there is nothing %2 can do about stingy server configurations. :(
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, %1 sprečava da %2 preuzme izravno ovu sliku.
Trebat ćete preuzeti ovu datoteku pomoću internetskog preglednika, a zatim ga ručno učitati u %2.
I iskreno se ispričavajte zbog ove neugodnosti, ali nažalost ne postoji ništa što može učiniti %2 Krute konfiguracije poslužitelja.:(

phrase.original: This URL is not valid. Please make sure the URL begins with "http://" or "ftp://".
phrase.translation: Ovaj URL nije valjan. Provjerite je li URL počinje s "http:

phrase.original: Please be respectful of copyrights when downloading images. Even if an image is available online, it may not be licensed for use outside a specific website. Thanks!
phrase.translation: Molimo poštujte autorska prava pri preuzimanju slika. Čak i ako je slika dostupna na mreži, možda nije licencirana za upotrebu izvan određene web-lokacije. Hvala!

phrase.original: currently available programs (listed by window title)
phrase.translation: Trenutno dostupni programi (navedeni u naslovu prozora)

phrase.original: Please select a window to capture.
This program is currently minimized. Restore it to normal size for best results.
phrase.translation: Ovaj je program trenutno minimiziran. Vratite ga u normalnu veličinu za najbolje rezultate.

phrase.original: Some programs (including Windows Store apps) do not allow direct screen captures. If an application preview appears as a black square, you will need to take a full desktop screenshot, then manually crop the desired window region.
phrase.translation: Neki programi (uključujući aplikacije sustava Windows Store) ne dopuštaju izravno snimanje zaslona. Ako se pretpregled programa pojavi kao crni kvadrat, morat ćete uzeti cijeli screenshot na radnoj površini, a zatim ručno izrezati željeno područje prozora.

phrase.original: Image printed successfully. (Note: depending on your printer, additional print confirmation screens may appear.)
phrase.translation: Slika je uspješno ispisana. (Napomena: ovisno o vašem pisaču, mogu se pojaviti dodatni prozori za potvrdu ispisa.)

phrase.original: %1 was unable to print the image. Please make sure that the specified printer (%2) is powered-on and ready for printing.
phrase.translation: %1 nije uspio ispisati sliku. Provjerite je li pisač ( %2) uključen i spreman za ispis.

phrase.original: Print previewing requires the FreeImage plugin, which could not be located on this computer. To enable previewing, please go to Edit -> Preferences and select "check for missing plugins on program start." The next time you load PhotoDemon, it will offer to download this plugin for you.
phrase.translation: Pretpregled ispisa zahtijeva dodatak FreeImage koji se ne može nalaziti na ovom računalu. Da biste omogućili pregledavanje, idite na Uređivanje -> Preferences i odaberite "check for missing plugins na početku programa". Sljedeći put kada učitate PhotoDemon, ponudit će vam preuzimanje tog dodatka za vas.
Transparentna boja (desnom tipkom miša kliknite za odabir)

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (256:1)
phrase.translation: Super kompresija, vrlo slaba kvaliteta slike (256: 1)

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (20)
phrase.translation: Super kompresija, vrlo slaba kvaliteta slike (20)

phrase.original: change file extension to match color model
phrase.translation: Promijenite proširenje datoteke kako bi odgovaralo modelu boja

phrase.original: lossy optimization is provided by pngquant
click to generate a new preview image
phrase.translation: Kliknite da biste generirali novu sliku pregleda

phrase.original: lossless optimization is provided by OptiPNG

PNG files support different compression strategies (called "filters"). Smart filter selection produces better compression. Use the automatic setting to have PhotoDemon test multiple strategies, and automatically select the one that produces the best compression.
please wait while a new preview image is created
phrase.translation: Pričekajte dok se stvori nova slika za pregled

phrase.original: These lossy optimization settings reduced file size by %1.
phrase.translation: Ove postavke za optimizaciju gubitka smanjuju veličinu datoteke za %1.

phrase.original: the fast, free, portable photo editor
Participate in development, design, or translation work
phrase.translation: Sudjelujte u razvoju, dizajnu ili prijevodu

phrase.original: PhotoDemon is Copyright %1 2000-%2 by Tanner Helland and Contributors
Thank you to our wonderful Patreon supporters!
(You can become a patron, too! Click here to learn more.)
generate difference map as a new layer
Peak signal-to-noise ratio (PSNR) between these images
As a rough estimate, these images are %1% similar.
Note: this operation will flatten the image before resizing it.
phrase.translation: Napomena: ova će operacija poravnati sliku prije nego što se promijeni veličinu.
Inicijaliziranje sadržaja koji je svjestan sadržaja
Primjena veličine sadržaja koji je svjestan sadržaja

phrase.original: Remove tags that might contain personal information
phrase.translation: Uklonite oznake koje mogu sadržavati osobne podatke

phrase.original: Copy this tag to the clipboard
Reset tag to its original value
Mark this entire group for removal
phrase.translation: Ovu cijelu grupu označite za uklanjanje

phrase.original: Copy all tags in this group to the clipboard
Reset entire group to its original values
phrase.translation: Poništite cijelu grupu na izvorne vrijednosti

phrase.original: Metadata support is provided by the open-source ExifTool library.
phrase.translation: Podrška metapodataka osigurava otvorena ExifTool knjižnica.

phrase.original: "System" tags are provided by the operating system. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: Sustav "System" osigurava operacijski sustav. Nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodaci.

phrase.original: "File" tags are required by this image format. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: Oznake "Datoteka" zahtijevaju ovaj format slike. Nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodaci.

phrase.original: ICC profiles are handled automatically by PhotoDemon. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: Photodemon automatski upravlja ICC profilima. Nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodaci.

phrase.original: "Inferred" tags are hypothetical values inferred from other metadata. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: Znakovi "zanemareni" su hipotetičke vrijednosti izvedene iz drugih metapodataka. Nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodaci.

phrase.original: This is a protected tag. Edits are allowed, but they may be overwritten to produce a valid image file.
phrase.translation: Ovo je zaštićena oznaka. Uređivanja su dopuštena, ali se mogu prebrisati za izradu valjane slikovne datoteke.

phrase.original: This tag is restricted. It cannot be edited, and removal requests will be ignored if they result in an invalid file.
phrase.translation: Oznaka je ograničena. Ne može se uređivati, a zahtjevi za uklanjanje neće se zanemariti ako rezultiraju nevažećom datotekom.
Samo datumi (GGGG: mm: dd HH: MM: SS [.ss] [

phrase.original: list of %1, one entry per line
Click to change the color used for empty borders
phrase.translation: Kliknite da biste promijenili boju koja se koristi za prazne granice

phrase.original: when changing aspect ratio, fit image to new size by
phrase.translation: Prilikom mijenjanja omjera slike prilagodite sliku novoj veličini

phrase.original: fitting inclusively, with transparent borders as necessary
phrase.translation: Uklapajući se uklopno, s transparentnim granicama po potrebi

phrase.original: fitting exclusively, and cropping as necessary
phrase.translation: Ugradnja isključivo, i obrezivanje po potrebi

phrase.original: Resampling affects the quality of a resized image. For a good summary of resampling techniques, visit the Image Resampling article on Wikipedia.
phrase.translation: Ponovno uzorkovanje utječe na kvalitetu slike promijenjene veličine. Za dobar sažetak tehnika ponovnog snimanja posjetite članak o ponovnom provođenju slike na Wikipediji.

phrase.original: When changing an image's aspect ratio, undesirable stretching may occur. PhotoDemon can avoid this by using empty borders or cropping instead.
phrase.translation: Kod mijenjanja omjera slike, može doći do neželjenog istezanja. PhotoDemon to može izbjeći upotrebom praznih granica ili obrezivanja.

phrase.original: make the new layer the active layer
if imported layer names match existing layer names
replace existing layers with imported ones
close images normally (prompt for unsaved changes)
color to erase (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: Boja za brisanje (kliknite desnom tipkom miša za odabir)

phrase.original: Adding new alpha channel to image
phrase.translation: Dodavanje novog alfa kanala na sliku

phrase.original: Add a blank layer to the image.
Move the current layer upward in the layer stack.
phrase.translation: Premjestite trenutni sloj prema gore u slojni sloj.

phrase.original: Move the current layer downward in the layer stack.
phrase.translation: Premjestite trenutačni sloj prema dolje u slojni sloj.

phrase.original: File tools: create, load, and save image files
phrase.translation: Alati za datoteke: stvaranje, učitavanje i spremanje slikovnih datoteka

phrase.original: Undo/Redo tools: revert destructive changes made to an image or layer
Non-destructive tools: move, rotate, or apply certain photo adjustments without permanently modifying an image
phrase.translation: Alati bez razaranja: pomicanje, zakretanje ili primjenu određenih prilagodbi fotografija bez trajne izmjene slike

phrase.original: Select tools: isolate parts of an image or layer for further editing
phrase.translation: Odaberite alate: izolirajte dijelove slike ili sloj za daljnje uređivanje

phrase.original: Text tools: create and edit text layers
phrase.translation: Tekstualni alati: stvaranje i uređivanje tekstnih slojeva

phrase.original: Paint tools: use a mouse, touchpad, or pen tablet to apply brushstrokes to an image or layer
phrase.translation: Alati za bojanje: upotrijebite miš, dodirnu pločicu ili olovku za primjenu četkica na sliku ili sloj

phrase.original: This option will create a blank image. Other ways to create new images can be found in the File -> Import menu.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija stvara praznu sliku. Ostali načini stvaranja novih slika možete pronaći u izborniku Datoteka -> Uvoz.

phrase.original: Another way to open images is dragging them from your desktop or Windows Explorer and dropping them onto PhotoDemon.
phrase.translation: Drugi način otvaranja slika je povlačenje s radne površine ili Windows Explorera i ispuštanje na PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: Open one or more images for editing
phrase.translation: Otvorite jednu ili više slika za uređivanje

phrase.original: If the current image has not been saved, you will receive a prompt to save it before it closes.
phrase.translation: Ako trenutna slika nije spremljena, primit ćete upit da ga spremite prije zatvaranja.

phrase.original: Because you have turned off save prompts (via Edit -> Preferences), you WILL NOT receive a prompt to save this image before it closes.
phrase.translation: Budući da ste isključili izuzimanje upita (putem Uređivanje -> Postavke), NEĆE primiti zahtjev za spremanje ove slike prije zatvaranja.

phrase.original: WARNING: this will overwrite the current image file. To save to a different file, use the "Save As" button.
phrase.translation: UPOZORENJE: ovo će prebrisati trenutnu slikovnu datoteku. Da biste spremili drugu datoteku, upotrijebite gumb "Spremi kao".

phrase.original: You have specified "safe" save mode, which means that each save will create a new file with an auto-incremented filename.
phrase.translation: Naveli ste "siguran" način rada za spremanje, što znači da će svaki spremiti stvoriti novu datoteku s automatski zabilježenim nazivom datoteke.

phrase.original: Use this to quickly save a lossless copy of the current image. The lossless copy will be saved in PDI format, in the image's current folder, using the current filename (plus an auto-incremented number, as necessary).
phrase.translation: Koristite ovo za brzo spremanje kopije trenutne slike bez gubitaka. Kopija bez gubitka bit će spremljena u PDI formatu, u trenutnoj mapi slike, koristeći trenutni naziv datoteke (plus automatski povećani broj, po potrebi).

phrase.original: The Save As command always raises a dialog, so you can specify a new file name, folder, and/or image format for the current image.
phrase.translation: Naredba Spremi kao uvijek postavlja dijaloški okvir, tako da možete odrediti novi naziv datoteke, mapu i

phrase.original: Save As (export to new format or filename)
phrase.translation: Spremi kao (izvoz u novi format ili naziv datoteke)
Ručno (pomicanje slike kliknuvši i povlačenjem slike)
Pomicanje i promjena veličine slojnih slojeva

phrase.original: Fills support many different styles. Click to switch between solid color, pattern, and gradient styles.
phrase.translation: Ispunjava podršku mnogim različitim stilovima. Kliknite da biste se prebacivali između krutih boja, uzoraka i stilova gradijenta.

phrase.original: Tolerance controls how similar two pixels must be before spreading the fill between them.
phrase.translation: Tolerancija kontrolira kako slični dva piksela moraju biti prije nego što širenje ispuna između njih.

phrase.original: Normally, fill operations analyze the entire image. You can also analyze just the active layer.
phrase.translation: Normalno, operacije popunjavanja analiziraju cijelu sliku. Također možete analizirati samo aktivni sloj.

phrase.original: Normally, fills spread out from a target pixel, adding neighboring pixels as it goes. You can alternatively set it to analyze the entire image, without regard for continuity.
phrase.translation: Normalno, ispunjava se širenje iz ciljanog piksela, dodajući susjedne piksele kako ide. Možete ga alternativno postaviti za analizu cijele slike bez obzira na kontinuitet.

phrase.original: This option controls how pixels are analyzed when adding them to the fill.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija kontrolira kako se pikseli analiziraju kada ih dodaju u punjenje.

phrase.original: ignore transparent pixels when auto-activating layers
phrase.translation: Ignorirajte prozirne piksele kada automatski aktiviraju slojeve

phrase.original: Make current layer transforms (size, angle, and shear) permanent. This action is never required, but if viewport rendering is sluggish, it may improve performance.
phrase.translation: Napravite trajni sloj pretvorbe trenutnog sloja (veličina, kut i smicanje). Ta radnja nikad nije potrebna, no ako je prikazivanje prikaza tromo, može poboljšati izvedbu.

phrase.original: Lock this value. (Only one value can be locked at a time. If you lock a new value, previously locked values will unlock.)
Click to change the way selections are rendered onto the image canvas. This has no bearing on selection contents - only the way they appear while editing.
phrase.translation: Kliknite da biste promijenili način odabira na platnu. Ovo nema utjecaja na sadržaj odabira - samo način na koji se pojavljuju tijekom uređivanja.

phrase.original: This option controls how smoothly a selection blends with its surroundings.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija kontrolira glatko odabir mješavine s okolinom.

phrase.original: These options control the area affected by a selection. The selection can be modified on-canvas while any of these settings are active. For more advanced selection adjustments, use the Select menu.
phrase.translation: Ove opcije kontroliraju područje na koje utječe selekcija. Odabir se može promijeniti na platnu dok je bilo koja od ovih postavki aktivna. Za naprednije podešavanje odabira koristite izbornik Odaberi.

phrase.original: This option adjusts the width of the selection border.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija podešava širinu granice odabira.

phrase.original: This feathering slider allows for immediate feathering adjustments. For performance reasons, it is limited to small radii. For larger feathering radii, please use the Select -> Feathering menu.
phrase.translation: Ovaj klizač za omatanje omogućuje trenutačne prilagodbe perja. Zbog razloga izvedbe, ograničen je na male radijuse. Za veće radijalne zrake koristite izbornik Select -> Feathering.

phrase.original: This option adjusts the roundness of a rectangular selection's corners.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija podešava okrugli kut kutova pravokutnog odabira.

phrase.original: This option adjusts the width of a line selection.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija podešava širinu odabira linije.

phrase.original: This option adjusts the curvature, if any, of a polygon selection's sides.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija podešava zakrivljenost, ako postoji, poligonskog odabira.

phrase.original: This option increases the smoothness of a hand-drawn lasso selection.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija povećava glatkoću laserskog izbora.

phrase.original: Tolerance controls how similar two pixels must be before adding them to a magic wand selection.
phrase.translation: Tolerancija kontrolira kako slični dva piksela moraju biti prije dodavanja u čarobni štapić.

phrase.original: The magic wand can operate on the entire image, or just the active layer.
phrase.translation: Čarobni štapić može raditi na cijeloj slici ili samo aktivnom sloju.

phrase.original: Normally, the magic wand will spread out from the target pixel, adding neighboring pixels to the selection as it goes. You can alternatively set it to search the entire image, without regards for continuity.
phrase.translation: Normalno, čarobni štapić će se proširiti iz ciljnog piksela, dodajući susjedne piksele na odabir kao što ide. Možete ga alternativno postaviti za pretraživanje cijele slike, bez obzira na kontinuitet.

phrase.original: This option controls which criteria the magic wand uses to determine whether a pixel should be added to the current selection.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija kontrolira koje kriterije čarobni štapić koristi kako bi utvrdio treba li dodati pikselu trenutnom odabiru.

phrase.original: This is an advanced text layer. To edit it with the basic text tool, you must first convert it to a basic text layer.
Click here to convert this layer to basic text.
This is a basic text layer. To edit it with the advanced text tool, you must first convert it to an advanced text layer.
Click here to convert this layer to advanced text.
start a new language file from scratch
phrase.translation: Započnite novu jezičnu datoteku od nule

phrase.original: e.g. "complete", "unfinished", etc. Any descriptive text is acceptable.
phrase.translation: npr "Potpuni", "nedovršeni", itd. Bilo koji opisni tekst prihvatljiv.

phrase.original: e.g. "English" or "English (US)". This text will be displayed in PhotoDemon's Language menu.
phrase.translation: npr "Engleski" ili "Engleski (SAD)". Ovaj će tekst biti prikazan u izborniku PhotoDemon's Language.

phrase.original: e.g. "US" for "United States". Please use the official 2-character ISO 3166-1 format.
phrase.translation: npr "SAD" za "Sjedinjene Države". Molimo koristite službeni format 2-znaka ISO 3166-1.

phrase.original: e.g. "en" for "English". Please use the official 2-character ISO 639-1 format.
phrase.translation: npr "En" za "engleski". Molimo koristite službeni format 2-znaka ISO 639-1.

phrase.original: Save this translation and proceed to the next phrase
phrase.translation: Spremite ovaj prijevod i idite na sljedeću frazu

phrase.original: automatically estimate missing translations (via Google Translate)
phrase.translation: Automatski procjenjuje prijevode koji nedostaju (putem Google Prevoditelja)

phrase.original: CTRL+ENTER automatically saves and proceeds to next phrase
Initiate auto-translation of all missing phrases
phrase.translation: Pokrenite automatsko prevođenje svih nedostajućih fraza

phrase.original: This action can take a very long time to complete. Once started, it cannot be canceled. Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: Ta radnja može potrajati jako dugo. Nakon što je započeo, ne može se otkazati. Jeste li sigurni da želite nastaviti?

phrase.original: Automatic translations were interrupted (the translation object stopped responding). The existing work has been auto-saved.
phrase.translation: Automatski prijevodi prekinuti su (prevođeni je objekt prestao reagirati). Postojeći rad je automatski spremljen.

phrase.original:
Are you sure you want to delete %1?
(Even though this is an official PhotoDemon language file, you can safely delete it.)
phrase.translation:
Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati %1?
(Iako je riječ o službenoj datoteci PhotoDemon jezika, možete je sigurno izbrisati.)

phrase.original: You do not have access to this folder. Please log in as an administrator and try again.
phrase.translation: Nemate pristup ovoj mapi. Prijavite se kao administrator i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original:
Are you sure you want to delete %1?
(Unless you have manually backed up this language file, this action cannot be undone.)
phrase.translation:
Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati %1?
(Osim ako ste ručno izradili sigurnosnu kopiju ove jezične datoteke, ta se radnja ne može poništiti.)

phrase.original: Please select a language before continuing to the next step.
phrase.translation: Odaberite jezik prije nastavka na sljedeći korak.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the master language file could not be located on this PC. This file is included with the official release of PhotoDemon, but it may not be included with development or beta builds.
To start a new translation, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, datoteka glavnog jezika ne može se nalaziti na ovom računalu. Ova datoteka je uključena u službeni izdanje PhotoDemona, no možda neće biti uključena u razvoj ili beta gradnju.
To započeti novi prijevod, preuzmite novu kopiju PhotoDemona iz photodemon.org.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this language file could not be loaded. It's possible the copy on this PC is out-of-date.
To continue, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, ovu jezičnu datoteku nije moguće učitati. Moguće je da je kopija na ovom računalu out-of-date.
To nastavite, preuzmite novu kopiju PhotoDemona iz photodemon.org.

phrase.original: Language file could not be loaded
This tool allows you to create and edit PhotoDemon language files.
phrase.translation: Ovaj alat vam omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje datoteka jezika PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: Please start by selecting a base language file. If the selected file already contains translation data, you will be able to edit any existing translations, as well as add translations that may be missing.
phrase.translation: Započnite odabirom datoteke baznog jezika. Ako odabrana datoteka već sadrži podatke o prijevodu, moći ćete urediti sve postojeće prijevode, kao i dodati prijevode koji možda nedostaju.

phrase.original: This page also allows you to delete unused language files. Note that there is no Undo when deleting language files, so please be careful!
phrase.translation: Ova stranica također vam omogućuje brisanje neiskorištenih jezičnih datoteka. Imajte na umu da nema poništavanja pri brisanju jezičnih datoteka, pa budite oprezni!

phrase.original: Upon clicking Next, the selected file will automatically be validated and parsed. Depending on the number of translations present, this process may take a few seconds.
phrase.translation: Nakon što kliknete Dalje, odabrana datoteka automatski će biti potvrđena i analizirana. Ovisno o broju prisutnih prijevoda, ovaj postupak može potrajati nekoliko sekundi.

phrase.original: (For best results, do not use this editor in the IDE!)
phrase.translation: (Za najbolje rezultate, nemojte koristiti ovaj urednik u IDE-u!)

phrase.original: In this step, please provide a bit of metadata regarding this language. This information helps PhotoDemon know how to handle this language file.
phrase.translation: U ovom koraku navedite malo metapodataka u vezi s ovim jezikom. Ove informacije pomažu PhotoDemonu znati kako se nositi s ovom jezičnom datotekom.

phrase.original: The most important items on this page are the language ID and language name. If these items are missing or invalid, PhotoDemon won't be able to use the language file.
phrase.translation: Najvažnije stavke na ovoj stranici su jezični ID i naziv jezika. Ako te stavke nedostaju ili nisu valjane, PhotoDemon neće moći koristiti jezičnu datoteku.

phrase.original: If multiple translators have worked on this language file, please separate their names with commas. If this language file is based on an existing language file, please include the original author's name.
phrase.translation: Ako su više prevoditelja radili na ovoj jezičnoj datoteci, odvojite njihova imena zarezima. Ako se ova jezična datoteka temelji na postojećoj jezičnoj datoteci, navedite izvorni autorov naziv.

phrase.original: (NOTE: changes made to this page won't be auto-saved unless you click the Next or Previous button.)
phrase.translation: (NAPOMENA: promjene na ovoj stranici neće biti automatski spremljene osim ako ne kliknete gumb Sljedeće ili Prethodno.)

phrase.original: This final step allows you to edit existing translations, and add missing ones.
phrase.translation: Ovaj zadnji korak omogućuje uređivanje postojećih prijevoda i dodavanje nedostajućih.

phrase.original: Every time a phrase is modified, an autosave will automatically be created in PhotoDemon's user language folder. This means you can exit the program at any time without losing your work.
phrase.translation: Svaki put kada se izraz promijeni, automatsko spremanje automatski će se stvoriti u MapDomonovoj korisničkoj mapi. To znači da možete izaći iz programa u bilo kojem trenutku bez gubitka posla.
